title: GetActionList (Method)
text:
METHOD GetActionList : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets a action list and action list text at index nIndex from the Action-BACnet-Propetrty and Action_Text-BACnetProperty of this BACnet-Command-Object at the same time.
So both description and action are aquired simultaneously (outputs pActionList and sctionListText).

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the action list to get.

rows.Name: pActionList
rows.Comment:
The returned Pointer gets filled with the data of IEC_BACNET_EVENT_PARAMETER AND (!) the data referenced within evtParams.
After usage, useFreeStackAllocatedMemory, to free the used memory. The pointer only points to a single action list.

rows:
The corresponding action text describing the aquired action
list.
